text:
Hello, I'm new to HubSpot development. I used html + css + js Visual stadia code to make counting numbers function dynamically, and it worked. However, when I tested the module html + css + js code on HubSpot, the counting numbers did not work.
Could somebody please assist me in determining the cause and offering a solution?  Thank you in advance! <https://www.loom.com/share/93d7829546c947de961a7efa66837e21>
